mapper.select: select * from board order by article_id desc
select b.article_id, b.title, b.img, b.name, f.board_type_id, f.content, b.reg_date from board b join free_board f on b.article_id = f.article_id where b.board_type_id = 1 order by b.article_id desc;

select b.article_id, b.title, b.img, b.name, f.board_type_id, f.content, b.reg_date from board b join free_board f on b.article_id = f.article_id join hash_tag ht on b.article_id = ht.article_id join tags t on ht.tag_id = t.tag_id where b.board_type_id = 1 and t.tag_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by b.article_id desc;
